title: Bushbar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Caribbean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant and bar serving organic local and home-grown food. Located in sun gardens and grows most of the produce. Has Wi-Fi. Has 4 bungalows for rent. Previously operated as zensBushBar. Feb 2014 reported still open but not pure veg.
